comment.author: 38135635@N07
comment._content: When I first saw this photograph, it struck me for half a second.  The way his face seems so chiseled, what with his clearly distinguished ears, eyes, and lips just captivate the viewer.  His expression is so relaxed but cool at the same time.  I really like it!

comment.author: 16432037@N05
comment._content: Played Pro Baseball rom 1907-1917. On the NY Yankees from 1910-1913. Imagine what that sweater and hat would be worth on todays open market?

comment.author: 34593252@N05
comment._content: kvd2390, I agree.  It's a captivating photo.  The term "they don't make 'em like that anymore" comes to mind.
